document_data.mainbody: '''Chaos domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with chaotic [[spell]]s and powers.
document_data.Powers: A priest with this domain could cast [[:Category:chaotic spells|chaotic spells]].
document_data.Spells: As they advanced, a priest with this domain could protect against lawful beings and effects with ''[[protection from law]]'', ''[[magic circle against law]]'', ''[[dispel law]]'', and ''[[cloak of chaos]]'', and assault lawful or non-chaotic beings with ''[[chaos hammer]]'' and ''[[word of chaos]]''. They could break objects with ''[[shatter]]'' or give them life with ''[[animate objects]]''. Finally, they could summon powerful beings of chaos to their aid with ''[[summon monster IX]]''.
